meanings.definition: A British coin worth two pennies.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny twopence on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She saved up all her twopence to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The twopence rolled away, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as rare as a twopence in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The twopence gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.sent1: He only had twopence left after buying lunch.
meanings.sent2: She offered to pay twopence for the delicious cookies.
meanings.sent3: I wouldn't give twopence for his chances of winning.
meanings.sent4: Her words were worth more than twopence to him.
meanings.sent5: The twopence jingled in his pocket, a reminder of thriftiness.
